---
{"dg-publish":true,"permalink":"/topics/career/job-search-strategy/"}
---

**Job search [[Topics/Business/Strategy\|strategy]]** is is about the various methods you use to [[Topics/Career/Finding job opportunities\|find a job]].

# Developing your strategy
Effective job search strategy is largely dependent on two things:
1. Your [[Topics/Career/Candidate-Market Fit\|candidate-market fit]]
2. Your job security / life stability
